name: Run Part Two | Can you trust me?
summary:
This is Part two of my first Game "Run" the Background Story of the Game is that you'r an test object and the one who's testing you tests if you can trust him/her because he wants to recreate the Humans, i will bring this Story into the game when im better at Programming (im still a beginner i made this game in 7 Days and this is still the Beta if you find any Bugs write it in the Comments or contact me! and sorry for my english i hope its okay.) 
 
WARNING: DEMO VERSION DO NOT SHOWN THE FINAL QUALITY OF PRODUCT. IT MAY CONTAIN BUGS/GLITCHS. 
 
if you want to support me you can donate on Patreon or just click the button ingame: https://www.patreon.com/DevUltimatex 
 
Controls: 
W= Move Forward 
S= Move Backwards 
A= Strafe Left 
D= Strafe Right 
Left Shift= Run 
CTRL= Crouch 
F= Toggle Flashlight 
E= Interact 
ESC= Pause
storyline: You'r an test object and the one who's testing you tests if you can trust him/her because he wants to recreate the Humans.(more storry comming soon!)
